attributes.action: reject the closure of Post Offices in Dumfries & Galloway
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dumfries & Galloway's communities are hugely dependent on its network of sub post offices - We reject the plans to force widespread closures on a community that relies upon their services.

In many small communities across the region, sub post offices are the only link for the community and perform a vital public service role, whilst in larger communities they are a valued provider of lifeline services.

With 2,500 proposed closures across the country, the axe is likely to fall on those that depend on them the most, with Dumfries & Galloway facing the brunt of this unpopular government policy. 

We reject their closure and ask that the Government looks again at new ways of allowing sub-post offices to provide the new services that will secure their future.
